short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search FindZebra from the context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Findzebra is a specialized search engine that focuses on rare diseases and genes associated with rare diseses. This plugin provides an easy way to search for disease information for rare diseases on the website Findzebra.com.
